scenario_details.name: Main Custom Agents Tab Navigation
scenario_details.description: Can I navigate to Custom Agents tab and access all agent features?
test_steps: Click Custom Agents tab from main navigation (Cmd+9)
Can I see the agent design tools clearly?
Can I access the agent marketplace from here?
Can I return to other tabs seamlessly?
acceptance_criteria: Custom Agents tab is clickable and responsive
Navigation between agent views is smooth
Agent designer tools are visually clear
critical_paths: Main Menu → Custom Agents → Agent Designer
Custom Agents → My Library → Edit Agent
recommendations: Test custom agents tab navigation with real user interactions

scenario_details.name: Agent Creation Workflow Navigation
scenario_details.description: Can I navigate through the complete agent creation process?
test_steps: Does agent designer interface open correctly?
Can I configure agent behavior and appearance?
Can I test the agent before saving?
Does save and publish workflow complete?
acceptance_criteria: Agent creation flow is intuitive and clear
All agent configuration options are accessible
critical_paths: Designer → Behavior Config → Skills → Test → Save
recommendations: Test complete agent creation flow end-to-end
Validate agent testing and preview functionality
Ensure agent save and publish workflow is seamless

scenario_details.name: Agent Marketplace Browsing and Installation
scenario_details.description: Can I effectively browse and install agents from the marketplace?
test_steps: Can I search for specific agent types?
Can I view agent details and ratings?
Does the install process work smoothly?
Are installed agents added to my library?
Can I rate and review installed agents?
recommendations: Test marketplace search with various queries
Validate agent installation and integration process
Ensure marketplace ratings and reviews work correctly

scenario_details.name: Agent Library Management
scenario_details.description: Can I effectively manage my collection of custom agents?
test_steps: Can I see all my created and installed agents?
Can I edit existing agent configurations?
Does agent deletion work with confirmation?
acceptance_criteria: All agents are displayed with clear status
Performance data is meaningful and accurate
Search and filter options work effectively
critical_paths: Library → Select Agent → Edit → Save → Test

scenario_details.name: Multi-Agent Workflow Creation
scenario_details.description: Can I create and manage workflows with multiple custom agents?
test_steps: Can I create a new workflow easily?
Can I assign specific roles to agents?
Does the workflow designer work intuitively?
Can I test workflows before deployment?
acceptance_criteria: Agent selection and assignment is clear
Error handling and recovery work properly
critical_paths: Workflow → Create → Add Agents → Define Roles → Test → Deploy

scenario_details.name: Agent Performance Dashboard
scenario_details.description: Can I monitor and analyze the performance of my custom agents?
test_steps: Can I view individual agent analytics?
Are performance trends visible over time?
Can I identify and address performance issues?
acceptance_criteria: Charts and graphs are readable and informative
Historical data is accessible and useful

scenario_details.name: Visual Agent Designer Functionality
scenario_details.description: Are all agent design tools functional and intuitive?
test_steps: Test skill assignment and proficiency settings
acceptance_criteria: All design tools provide immediate visual feedback
Configuration changes are reflected in preview
Memory settings affect agent behavior appropriately

scenario_details.name: Agent Testing and Validation
scenario_details.description: Can I effectively test agents before deployment?
test_steps: Test agent responses to various inputs
acceptance_criteria: Testing interface is comprehensive and clear
Agent responses are consistent with design
Memory and learning features work as intended

recommendations: Conduct comprehensive agent testing with real scenarios
Test agent creation and customization workflows thoroughly
Validate marketplace integration and agent installation
Test performance monitoring and analytics accuracy
Validate agent testing and preview functionality
Ensure custom agents integrate with main application flow
next_steps: Verify Xcode build success with custom agents integration
Test complete custom agents navigation flow manually
Validate agent creation and customization workflows
Test marketplace browsing and agent installation
Deploy to TestFlight for human verification
Gather user feedback on custom agents usability
Move to Phase 4: Local LLM Integration
